description: Sabrina Eichgeborn is a 23-year-old female demon hunter and bounty hunter from the German Empire.  Formerly a powerful demon in Hell, she was bound by a priest and forced to hunt other demons. Over time, she converted to Christianity and now dedicates her life to God's will, hunting demonic forces. She's known for her cool, mature, and courageous personality, her devotion to her faith, and her mentorship of a younger demon hunter.
